statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT segment_name, lead_score, customer_id FROM customer_segments WHERE lead_score > 50 ORDER BY segment_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY lead_score ASC
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS segment_count FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY segment_count DESC
SELECT AVG(lead_score) AS average_score, MAX(lead_score) AS max_score, MIN(lead_score) AS min_score FROM customer_segments
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments WHERE lead_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, lead_score, customer_id FROM customer_segments;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, effectiveness_score FROM lead_nurturing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, effectiveness_score, strategy_id FROM lead_nurturing_strategies;
SELECT segment_name, strategy_name, effectiveness_score FROM lead_nurturing_strategies;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments WHERE lead_score > 80 ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, lead_score FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%' AND lead_score < 90;
SELECT segment_name, AVG(lead_score) AS avg_score FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING avg_score > 70;

SELECT segment_name, strategy_name, effectiveness_score FROM lead_nurturing_strategies INNER JOIN customer_segments ON lead_nurturing_strategies.segment_name = customer_segments.segment_name ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, lead_score FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT strategy_name FROM nurturing_strategies JOIN segments ON nurturing_strategies.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT segment_name FROM segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT c.name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN nurturing_strategies ns ON c.customer_id = ns.strategy_id JOIN segments s ON ns.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT c.name, s.segment_name, s.description FROM customers c JOIN nurturing_strategies ns ON c.customer_id = ns.strategy_id JOIN segments s ON ns.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE c.lead_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM lead_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT customer_id, segment FROM customer_segments WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM nurturing_strategies WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM lead_scores ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM lead_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, segment_name FROM customer_data WHERE segment_name='VIP' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM nurturing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lead_scores ls JOIN customer_data cd ON ls.customer_id = cd.customer_id WHERE ls.score > 50 ORDER BY ls.score DESC, cd.customer_name ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments;
SELECT segment_name, lead_score FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.segment_name, l.lead_name FROM CustomerSegments c JOIN LeadScoring l ON c.lead_score = l.lead_score ORDER BY c.customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeadNurturing WHERE nurturing_type = 'Email' AND nurturing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT ci.interaction_id, ci.customer_id, ci.interaction_type, ci.interaction_date, cr.relationship_type FROM CustomerInteractions ci LEFT JOIN CustomerRelationship cr ON ci.customer_id = cr.customer_id ORDER BY ci.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE lead_score > 80;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT C.customer_id, C.segment_name, L.lead_name FROM CustomerSegments C INNER JOIN LeadScoring L ON C.lead_score = L.lead_score;
SELECT * FROM LeadNurturing WHERE nurturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT CI.customer_id, CI.interaction_type, CI.interaction_date, CR.relationship_type FROM CustomerInteractions CI LEFT JOIN CustomerRelationship CR ON CI.customer_id = CR.customer_id;
